title: How do I make Ranked Team Tags Appear In-Game?
body:
I formed a 5-man ranked today with all of the people being members of the ranked team but our team tag didn't appear

How do I make the Team Tag appear? Do I have to enable club tags?

replies.body:
Hmmm...if you have enough people in your club to have created a club tag, it should appear both in the Loading Screen and in-game as well.  Did this occur only for one game, or does it consistently not appear in any game that you play?

Reply back and let me know!
I believe he's referring to the now essentially defunct except on Treeline Ranked teams system and not clubs

I meant Ranked Team

It hasn't appeared since Dynamic Queue was released, I've only got it to work on Twisted Treeline
Correct, in order for this to work with Dynamic Queue, you will need to form a Club rather than a Ranked Team.
Why the hell did you guys remove ranked 5s? If you're going to ignore Twisted Treeline the way you do, what's even the point in teams at all?
Do you mean, RANKED TEAM or CLUB ?
